title: ExCap Style Provider Schema
description: A schema to provide typedef and correction checking for making a Style Provider Conditional

style.title: Wield Style
style.description: What wield style the player is going to be.

visible_offhand.title: Offhand Visibility
visible_offhand.description: whether the weapon is visible off hand.

slot.title: Skill Slot
slot.description: What skill slot to check for matching skill

category.title: Weapon Category
category.description: What weapon category is used to match.

weapon.title: Specific Item
weapon.description: What specific item id is used to check.

hand.title: Interaction Hand
hand.description: Which hand to check for the correct weapon

boolean_key.title: Boolean Data Key
boolean_key.description: What boolean data key will be used that is linked to said skill.
